sn20.11:4.2: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassā”ti?
sn20.11:4.4: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasiṅgālo ukkaṇḍakena nāma rogajātena phuṭṭho.
sn20.11:4.5: So yena yena icchati tena tena gacchati;
sn20.11:4.6: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha tiṭṭhati;
sn20.11:4.7: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nisīdati;
sn20.11:4.8: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nipajjati;
sn20.11:4.10: Sādhu khvassa, bhikkhave, yaṃ idhekacco sakyaputtiyapaṭiñño evarūpampi attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyetha.
